I'd go for 10 km. Lower than that, and your station might suddently disappear.

In an equatorial orbit, I've found that about 7.5km is the minimum safe altitude. There are mountains in the 5-6km(+?) range.

Many of my Kerbals have died trying to set the lowest "skimming" orbit record.
